Uses of Class
org.apache.commons.configuration.interpol.ConfigurationInterpolator

Packages that use ConfigurationInterpolator
org.apache.commons.configuration The Configuration main package. 
org.apache.commons.configuration.interpol A package with helper classes used for interpolation (variable substitution). 
 

Uses of ConfigurationInterpolator in org.apache.commons.configuration
 

Methods in org.apache.commons.configuration that return ConfigurationInterpolator
protected  ConfigurationInterpolator SubnodeConfiguration.createInterpolator()
          Creates a ConfigurationInterpolator with a chain to the parent's interpolator.
protected  ConfigurationInterpolator AbstractConfiguration.createInterpolator()
          Creates the interpolator object that is responsible for variable interpolation.
 ConfigurationInterpolator AbstractConfiguration.getInterpolator()
          Returns the ConfigurationInterpolator object that manages the lookup objects for resolving variables.
